org.openimaj.hadoop.tools.twitter.token.mode

Class WritableEnumCounter<T extends Enum<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.hadoop.tools.twitter.token.mode.WritableEnumCounter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the enum type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadableASCII, ReadWriteableASCII, WriteableASCII
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WritablePairEnum

    public abstract class WritableEnumCounter<T extends Enum<?>>
extends Object
implements ReadWriteableASCII
    A writeable hadoop Counter written using the enum used with the counter
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
